body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Eugene Alexander and the customer's name is Angela Stewart.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Eugene Alexander, and I am with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, I'm Angela Stewart. I'm just browsing for some motorcycle options.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Angela! What kind of motorcycle are you interested in? Do you have any specific models in mind?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Well, I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed. There are so many choices out there!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand. Let's narrow it down together! Could you please tell me what your budget is?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking to spend up to five thousand dollars.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That sounds reasonable! And just to assist you better, may I have your zip code as well?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's two zero two zero three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Angela! With your budget and location, I can provide you with the best options available. Are you looking for a new bike or a used one?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I think I might prefer a new one, but I'm open to suggestions.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! I will gather the information on our new models and available features for you. Thank you for your time today, Angela! If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out.
